templategroup.name: attachment
templategroup.template:
<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd"> 
<html xml:lang="en" lang="en" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
<head>
<title> upload </title>
<script language='JavaScript' type="text/javascript">
<!--
var is_send_form = window.parent.document.getElementById('is_send').value;
if(is_send_form == 1){
<if="$errormsg">
 alert('{$errormsg}');
<else>
  window.parent.document.getElementById('sub_form').click();
</if>
} else {
<if="$errormsg">
 alert('{$errormsg}');
<else>
 window.parent.document.getElementById('showattach').innerHTML = '{$upload['tmp']}';
</if>
 window.parent.document.getElementById('attach_do').value = 'upload';
 window.parent.document.getElementById('attach_num').value = 0;
 window.parent.document.getElementById('removeattachid').value = 0;
 window.parent.document.getElementById('attachdiv').innerHTML = '<input type="file" size="30" name="attachment0" id="attachment0" class="bginput" onchange="createattach(this);" />';
 window.parent.document.getElementById('attachbutton').innerHTML = '<input type="button" name="uploadbutton" id="uploadbutton" value=" {$lang['_addattach']} " class="button" onclick="sendattach();" />';
 window.parent.document.getElementById('submitform').disabled = false;
 if (window.parent.document.getElementById('preview')){
    window.parent.document.getElementById('preview').disabled = false;
 }
}
//-->
</script>
{CACHE_CSS}
</head>
<body>
</body>
</html>

{CACHE_CSS}
